verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%>. A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> maketh a glad <S%H8055><s%> father <S%H1><s%>; But a foolish <S%H3684><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> is the heaviness <S%H8424><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>.
Treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> nothing <S%H6666><s%>; But righteousness delivereth <S%H5337><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not suffer <S%H7456><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> to famish <S%H7456><s%>; But he thrusteth away <S%H1920><s%> the desire <S%H1942><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
He becometh poor <S%H7326><s%> that worketh <S%H6213><s%> with a slack <S%H7423><s%> hand <S%H3709><s%>; But the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> maketh rich <S%H6238><s%>.

He that gathereth <S%H103><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> is a wise <S%H7919><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>; But he that sleepeth <S%H7290><s%> in harvest <S%H7105><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> that causeth shame <S%H954><s%>.
Blessings <S%H1293><s%> are upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; But violence <S%H2555><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
The memory <S%H2143><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is blessed <S%H1293><s%>; But the name <S%H8034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall rot <S%H7537><s%>.
The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> will receive <S%H3947><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%>; But a prating <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> shall fall <S%H3832><s%>.
He that walketh <S%H3212><s%> uprightly <S%H8537><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> surely <S%H983><s%>; But he that perverteth <S%H6140><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%>.
He that winketh <S%H7169><s%> with the eye <S%H5869><s%> causeth <S%H5414><s%> sorrow <S%H6094><s%>; But a prating <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> shall fall <S%H3832><s%>.

The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>; But violence <S%H2555><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Hatred <S%H8135><s%> stirreth up <S%H5782><s%> strifes <S%H4090><s%>; But love <S%H160><s%> covereth <S%H3680><s%> all transgressions <S%H6588><s%>.

In the lips <S%H8193><s%> of him that hath discernment <S%H995><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%>; But a rod <S%H7626><s%> is for the back <S%H1460><s%> of him that is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>.
Wise <S%H2450><s%> men lay up <S%H6845><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the foolish <S%H191><s%> is a present <S%H7138><s%> destruction <S%H4288><s%>.
The rich man <S%H6223><s%>'s wealth <S%H1952><s%> is his strong <S%H5797><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>: The destruction <S%H4288><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> is their poverty <S%H7389><s%>.
The labor <S%H6468><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> tendeth to life <S%H2416><s%>; The increase <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, to sin <S%H2403><s%>.
He is in the way <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> that heedeth <S%H8104><s%> correction <S%H4148><s%>; But he that forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> erreth <S%H8582><s%>.
He that hideth <S%H3680><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%> is of lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>; And he that uttereth <S%H3318><s%> a slander <S%H1681><s%> is a fool <S%H3684><s%>.

In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> there wanteth <S%H2308><s%> not transgression <S%H6588><s%>; But he that refraineth <S%H2820><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> doeth wisely <S%H7919><s%>.
The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is as choice <S%H977><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>: The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is little worth <S%H4592><s%>.
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>; But the foolish <S%H191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> for lack <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>.
The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, it maketh rich <S%H6238><s%>; And he addeth <S%H3254><s%> no sorrow therewith <S%H6089><s%>.
It is as sport <S%H7814><s%> to a fool <S%H3684><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> wickedness <S%H2154><s%>; And so is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> to a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
The fear <S%H4034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, it shall come <S%H935><s%> upon him <S%H8378><s%>; And the desire of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be granted <S%H5414><s%>.
When the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> passeth <S%H5674><s%>, the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is no more <S%H6662><s%>; But the righteous is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> foundation <S%H3247><s%>.
As vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to the teeth <S%H8127><s%>, and as smoke <S%H6227><s%> to the eyes <S%H5869><s%>, So is the sluggard <S%H6102><s%> to them that send him <S%H7971><s%>.
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> prolongeth <S%H3254><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; But the years <S%H8141><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be shortened <S%H7114><s%>.
The hope <S%H8431><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be gladness <S%H8057><s%>; But the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the upright <S%H8537><s%>; But it is a destruction <S%H4288><s%> to the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall never <S%H5769><s%> be removed <S%H4131><s%>; But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> bringeth forth <S%H5107><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; But the perverse <S%H8419><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> what is acceptable <S%H7522><s%>; But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> speaketh perverseness <S%H8419><s%>.
